mean_cn: adj.有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的
mean_en: strongly favoring a particular point of view in a way that may cause argument :expressing a strong opinion
sentence: Tendentious celebrity news is a consistent feature of this magazine.
sentence_trans: 颇具倾向性的名人八卦是这本杂志的一贯特色。
word_etyma: tend伸展 ＋ ent...的 ＋ ious...的 → tendentious有倾向性的
